name: Boxlight Corporation
description: Boxlight Corporation is a leading global provider of interactive technology solutions and educational products. Established in 2015, Boxlight focuses on enhancing the learning experience by integrating innovative technology into classrooms worldwide. The company's product portfolio includes interactive displays, projectors, and software solutions that facilitate engaging and collaborative learning environments. Boxlight aims to empower educators and students by providing tools that foster creativity, critical thinking, and collaboration. Its flagship product, the MimioClassroom, offers a comprehensive suite of solutions designed to meet the diverse needs of educators and students, enabling seamless integration of technology in the learning process. In addition to hardware, Boxlight provides a range of professional development services to help educators maximize the potential of their technology investments. With a commitment to innovation and quality, Boxlight is dedicated to transforming education through technology, making learning more interactive and effective. The company continues to expand its reach globally, partnering with schools and educational institutions to support the future of education.
